Articles.Content:
I've just barely survived the forum wipe, and due to my graphics card burning up I can no longer play KSP...

I've decided I share some old artwork first before moving on to making something new.

First pictures from interstellar probe:

Landing you can walk away from...

That's how I imagined Laythe before I actually got there.

Thanks for watching!

The shadow part of the planets, when see from space, does not cover the planet the right way. the shadow is more on the center and past than what you drew here.

But anyway, excellent work !

Awesome! Very nice.

Shadows are so hard to get right sometimes. - The Director
Yeah, shadows need some thinking before drawing them. Shall do
Looks cool... Anyway, before the forum wipe I used to think these things were filtered screenshots... but on a closer look... they're not.
